Office of the Dean of Students     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Office of the Dean of Students      Office of the Dean of Students   Main Menu    About           Our Work, Mission and Values    Our Team    Student Handbook    Policies    Student Government    Religious Workers' Association    Request a Presentation    Location         Assistance           Academic Concerns    Health & Personal Concerns    Campus Life    Faculty & Staff Resources    U & I Care         Community Standards           Academic Integrity    Personal & Community Integrity    Community Standards Forms    Community Standards Process    Get Involved    Record Requests    Assessment & Reports         Student Veterans           Benefits and Forms    Get Connected    Resources for Students and Families    FAQs    Contact Student Veteran Affairs         Student Legal     Eyebrow menu    Veteran Forms    Community Standards Forms    U & I Care    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Office of the Dean of Students    About    Student Government        Student Government       Student Government at UIC   Staff members of the Office of the Dean of Students serve as advisors to student governance organizations, including the Student Member of the Board of Trustees, the Undergraduate Student Government, the Graduate Student Council, and the Health Profession Student Council.  Explore each group to find out ways to get help or to get involved in advocating for your peers on campus.      Table        President  Advisor  Website      Graduate Student Council  Sai-Siva Kare, skare3@uic.edu  Linda Deanna, Dean of Students   https://gradstudentcouncil.uic.edu/     Health Profession Student Council  Kavya Vaitla, kvaitl2@uic.edu  Linda Deanna, Dean of Students   http://hpsc.org.uic.edu/     Undergraduate Student Government  Taylor Holmes, tholme20@uic.edu  Annette Wright, Associate Dean of Students   https://usg.uic.edu/     Student Member of the Board of Trustee  Susan Panek, spanek4@uic.edu  Linda Deanna, Dean of Students   https://www.bot.uillinois.edu     Student Bar Association (Law Student Government)  Masayoshi Haynie, mhaynie@uic.edu  Jennifer Pope, Assistant Dean for Student Life & Leadership   https://sba.jmls.uic.edu/           Spring Elections   Learn everything about student government elections here. Depending on the time of year you can complete the intent to run form, learn about the candidates, or vote online.    Spring Elections    Election Planning Committee    Intent to Run             Documents & Forms  Student Government officers can access governance documents and financial forms critical for conducting the business of student governance here: Giveaway Form,  Requests for Funds Form, and Student Government Resource Guide.
